articles.author: Andrew Gregory
articles.title: Mediterranean diet 'can reduce heart attacks in people at higher risk' - The Guardian
articles.description: First study of its kind finds diet can benefit hundreds of millions with obesity, diabetes or other risk factors
articles.content: A Mediterranean diet can lower the risk of a heart attack, stroke or early death for hundreds of millions of people who have an increased possibility of cardiovascular disease, a global review of evi… [+3767 chars]
